audioText: J'entrerai gratis dans ce magasin quand je verrai le signe de la réalité virtuelle.
question: When will I enter this store for free?
options: When I see the virtual reality sign
When the promotional period begins next month
When I present my membership card at the entrance
When the store manager approves my special request
explanation: The correct answer is 'When I see the virtual reality sign'. The text states 'J'entrerai gratis dans ce magasin quand je verrai le signe de la réalité virtuelle' - I will enter this store for free when I see the virtual reality sign. 'Entrerai' is the first-person singular future of 'entrer' (to enter), 'gratis' means 'for free', and 'signe' means 'sign'.
source: Strategic vocabulary development - virtual reality shopping
